io.name: TCISFNDX0010201_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISFNDX0010201_inbound" /> <complexType name="TCISFNDX0010201_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="crdMemNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드회원번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="9" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="reqStlmUnitNo"> <annotation> <documentation>청구결제단위번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="iamtPrrgDt"> <annotation> <documentation>입금예정일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="stlmDay"> <annotation> <documentation>결제일</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="chrStrtDt"> <annotation> <documentation>청구시작일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="chrEndDt"> <annotation> <documentation>청구종료일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="scrnGbcd"> <annotation> <documentation>화면구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="qryYn"> <annotation> <documentation>조회여부</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="qryStrtDt"> <annotation> <documentation>조회시작일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="조회기간의 시작일자" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="qryEndDt"> <annotation> <documentation>조회종료일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="조회기간의 종료일자" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: TCISFNDX0010201_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISFNDX0010201_outbound" /> <complexType name="TCISFNDX0010201_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="stlmPrrgAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>결제예정금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="decimal"> <totalDigits value="20" /> <fractionDigits value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="rsltRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>조회결과_배열건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="rsltList" type="tns:RSLT_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>조회결과_배열</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="RSLT_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="RSLT_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="chrDt"> <annotation> <documentation>청구일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="totStlmAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>총결제금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="18" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
